title: The Careful Use of Compliments
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: She found Teviotdale Place halfway along the road that crossed over a small bridge. Edinburgh's  river, the Water of Leith, not a great river by the standards of many cities, looped its way through Stockbridge at this point.

title: The Careful Use of Compliments
author: McCall Smith, Alexander
snippet: Now,  standing outside the house in Teviotdale Place, Isabel looked down at her hands. She did that when she was nervous – she looked at her hands – and it somehow gave her courage.
